originalText.text: First time parking here and I must say I was pleasantly impressed! Attendant was friendly and courteous. Next time I’ll use this lots service instead of SpotHero they were way more expensive

text.text: First time parking here and I must say I was pleasantly impressed! Attendant was friendly and courteous. Next time I’ll use this lots service instead of SpotHero they were way more expensive

originalText.text: I was a monthly customer at this garage for more than a year, and it was by far one of my worst experiences parking in Manhattan. Some of the staff are incredibly rude, and the manager is even worse. Even if you call a day in advance, your car is never there. Once I complained after waiting for nearly a half hour, and one of the staff told the one attendant to ignore me and deal with the "gringos" since they complain louder. I would skip this garage at all costs.

text.text: I was a monthly customer at this garage for more than a year, and it was by far one of my worst experiences parking in Manhattan. originalText.text: Horrible place to park. For starters, if you don't speak Spanish then forget about communicating with the staff. They smudged grease all over my car, scratched it and refused to claim responsibility. To top it all off they charged my card three times the amount for parking without my authorization and are refusing to reimburse it.

originalText.text: I was very happy to with the parking here, I happened to have booked my reservation with SpotHero but when I got there I saw that it was a bit cheaper to just pay them directly, when I got there it was getting busy but it still only took 3 minutes to get out and when I got back it took 30 seconds from when they scanned my car till I was in my car! I've never had such a thing before it was also very specious there didn't feel like they scratching my car Everytime they turned a corner.

originalText.text: Ever time I park at this garage is busy and it’s not just be of the price, it’s the staff that are friendly and courteous to the customers even if it’s your first time parking there or your thousandth time always the same so I stick to this location.
